Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my phone get the Android 2.2 update (FroYo)?  I'm planning to buy an android phone and I've heard that SAMSUNG I5500 GALAXY 5 is the cheapest one. My question is, does SAMSUNG I5500 GALAXY 5 can be upgraded into Android 2.2?
